title: How to Breed a Sun Dragon in DragonVale

steps.title: Go to your breeding cave or the epic breeding island.
steps.content: Go to your breeding cave or the epic breeding island. Your park needs to be at level 10 or higher before trying to breed this dragon. Tap on the breeding area to make it glow.

steps.title: For a successful outcome, the elements of cold and lightning need to be present, and as such, there are numerous possible combinations of breeding pairs.
steps.content: For a successful outcome, the elements of cold and lightning need to be present, and as such, there are numerous possible combinations of breeding pairs. Some suggestions for the many possible combinations include: Firefly dragon with a cold dragon Blue fire dragon with a crystal dragon Ice dragon with a quake dragon Cold dragon with a storm dragon Fire dragon with a storm dragon Scorch dragon with a cold dragon.

steps.title: Wait 48 hours for breeding.
steps.content: Wait 48 hours for breeding. The egg color will be gold with a sun icon in the middle. Breeding time can be hastened by spending gems.

steps.title: Put the egg into nursery and wait another 48 hours until it hatches.
steps.content: Put the egg into nursery and wait another 48 hours until it hatches.

steps.title: Place the sun dragon in a sun habitat.
steps.content: Place the sun dragon in a sun habitat. To help it grow, feed it the same food as all baby dragons.
